per_frame_1=wave_r = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(6*time);
per_frame_2=wave_g = 0.5 + 0.5*sin(4.1*time);
per_frame_3=wave_b = -1 + (1-wave_r + 1-wave_g);
per_frame_4=warp = 0;
per_frame_5=
per_frame_6=ob_r = 1-abs(wave_r);
per_frame_7=ob_g = 1-abs(wave_g);
per_frame_8=ob_b = 1-abs(wave_b);
per_frame_9=ib_r = abs(wave_r);
per_frame_10=ib_b = abs(wave_b);
per_frame_11=ib_g = abs(wave_g);
per_frame_12=;
per_pixel_1=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_2=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_3=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_4=
per_pixel_5=xy = above(sin(time),0)*x + below(sin(1.34*time),0)*y + above((bass_att),1.1)*-1;
per_pixel_6=
per_pixel_7=dx = dx + dx_r;
per_pixel_8=dy = dy + dy_r;
per_pixel_9=sx = sx - abs(12*dx_r*(xy*sin(xy*bass_att*1.25)));
per_pixel_10=sy = sy - abs(12*dy_r*(xy*sin(xy*bass_att*1.25)));
per_pixel_11=rot = rot + 22*dx_r*(xy*cos(4*xy*treb_att));
per_pixel_12=cx = cx + 8*dx_r*(xy*sin(xy*mid_att*1.1));
per_pixel_13=cy = cy + 8*dy_r*(xy*sin(xy*mid_att*1.1));
per_pixel_14=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_15=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_16=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_17=
per_pixel_18=
per_pixel_19=zoom = zoom + 1.4*(2*dx_r*(1.5*((sin(time)-rad)*sin(8*rad))*2));
per_pixel_20=dy = dy + 0.4*(2*dy_r*(1.5*((sin(time)-rad)*sin(8*rad))*2));
per_pixel_21=dx = dx - 0.4*(2*dx_r*(1.5*((sin(time)-rad)*sin(8*ang))*2));
per_pixel_22=zoom = zoom - 1.4*(2*dy_r*(1.5*((sin(time)-rad)*sin(8*ang))*2));
per_pixel_23=
per_pixel_24=rot = rot + 4*abs(dy_r*(2.5*(cos(time)*0.5-rad*sin(12*rad))*bass_att));
per_pixel_25=thresh = above(bass_att,thresh)*2+(1-above(bass_att,thresh))*((thresh-1.3)*0.96+1.3);
per_pixel_26=
per_pixel_27=dx_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(5*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dx_r;
per_pixel_28=dy_r = equal(thresh,2)*0.015*sin(6*time)+(1-equal(thresh,2))*dy_r;
per_pixel_29=zoom = zoom + 0.01;
per_pixel_30=zoom = zoom + (0.05 + 0.04*sin(time))*(0.2*sin(ang*time));
per_pixel_31=rot = rot + 0.01*(0.5*cos(ang*5*bass*time));
per_pixel_32=
per_pixel_33=dx = dx + 0.1*above(rad,0.25)*dx_r;
per_pixel_34=dy = dy + 0.1*above(rad,0.25)*dy_r;
per_pixel_35=rot=0.1*pow(-ang,3)-1.18*sin(ang);
per_pixel_36=zoom=1.45*sin(-rad)+1.3+ sin(rad);
per_pixel_37=dx = dx + 0.09*sin(q8*0.785);
per_pixel_38=dy = dy + 0.09*sin(q8*0.675);
per_pixel_39=//zoom = zoom +q7;
